text.__SUMMARY__: Millettia galliflagrans is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Chua, L.S.L. (1998). "Millettia galliflagrans". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T36378A9992620. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T36378A9992620.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
